attributes.action: Fibre Optic in Northaw (Hertfordshire) and surrounding areas
attributes.additional_details:
The area of Northaw in Hertfordshire has been without a good internet connection for in excess of 5 years now with no significant increase in speed or connection.

The surrounding towns and villages of northaw (cuffley and potters bar) both currently have a fibre optic connection (in order to drive from potters bar to cuffley you must drive through northaw) For this reason i propose that Northaw get given access to the fibre optic system as well and thus increasing the speeds of the entire village
